name: Survive the riot
description:
A riot is coming up in a different dimension!

This game was created in 3 hours for Trijam #59

How to play:

Turn on sound!

Use 'WASD' or arrow keys to move

Try to stop the riot!

Be careful, only the rioters who are screaming are
causing trouble! Only catch these or you will
lose a life!
